system.requirements:
Tier 1; Fellowship 40
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership, Slaanesh
system.effect:
All Allies within 20 metres that can see this character gain +10 to Willpower Tests to resist Fear and Intimidation Attempts.
Talent doesn't affect the character themselves.

description.value: All Allies within 20 metres that can see this character gain +10 to Willpower Tests to resist Fear and Intimidation Attempts. Talent doesn't affect the character themselves.
